targets.rawSql:
SELECT market_id as symbol, SUM(volume) as volume
FROM app_trade_volume_1d
GROUP BY ROLLUP(symbol)

SELECT market_id as symbol, SUM(size*price) as volume
FROM app_trade
WHERE timestamp >= (
    EXTRACT(
        EPOCH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '$time_interval'
    ) * 1000000
  )::bigint
GROUP BY ROLLUP(symbol)

SELECT market_id, SUM(size*price) as volume
FROM app_fill
WHERE timestamp >= (
    EXTRACT(
        EPOCH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '$time_interval'
    ) * 1000000
  )::bigint
and profile_id not in (select profile_id from ignored_profile_ids)
group by rollup(market_id)

SELECT 
  t5.market_id,
  sum(notional) AS sum_notional 
FROM app_position t5
JOIN app_position_last_archive_timestamp t4 ON
  t5.market_id=t4.market_id AND t5.archive_timestamp=t4.archive_timestamp
where t5.side = 'long'
AND t5.profile_id NOT IN (select profile_id from ignored_profile_ids)
GROUP BY t5.market_id;

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), SUM(
  CASE WHEN ops_type ='deposit' THEN amount
  WHEN ops_type = 'withdrawal' THEN -amount
  END) as net_deposits
FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE ops_type in ('deposit', 'withdrawal') and status not in ('pending')
group by timestamp
order by timestamp desc

SELECT time_bucket('1d'::interval, to_timestamp(bucket/1e6)) group_bucket, count(distinct(profile_id)) 
FROM app_fill_profile_1d
WHERE bucket > $__unixEpochFrom()::bigint*1000000
GROUP BY group_bucket
LIMIT 100

SELECT time_bucket('7d'::interval, to_timestamp(bucket/1e6)) group_bucket, count(distinct(profile_id)) 
FROM app_fill_profile_1d
WHERE bucket > $__unixEpochFrom()::bigint*1000000
GROUP BY group_bucket
LIMIT 100

SELECT sum(amount) < 1 as funding_zero_sum FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE ops_type='funding'

SELECT count(distinct(wallet)) FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE ops_type='deposit'

SELECT count(distinct(wallet)) FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE ops_type='deposit' 
AND timestamp >= (
    EXTRACT(
        EPOCH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '$time_interval'
    ) * 1000000
  )::bigint

SELECT SUM(
  CASE WHEN ops_type ='deposit' THEN amount
  WHEN ops_type = 'withdrawal' THEN -amount
  END) as net_deposits
FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE ops_type in ('deposit', 'withdrawal') and status !='pending';

SELECT count(distinct(wallet)) FROM app_balance_operation 
WHERE ops_type='withdrawal' 
AND timestamp >= (
    EXTRACT(
        EPOCH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '$time_interval'
    ) * 1000000
  )::bigint

SELECT count(distinct(profile_id)) 
 FROM app_fill
 WHERE timestamp >= (
    EXTRACT(
        EPOCH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '7 days'
    ) * 1000000
  )::bigint

SELECT count(distinct(profile_id))
 FROM app_fill
 WHERE timestamp >= (
    EXTRACT(
        EPOCH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 days'
    ) * 1000000
  )::bigint

SELECT market_id as symbol, sum(-1*fee)
FROM app_fill_fee_1d 
group by rollup(market_id)

SELECT market_id as symbol, sum(price*size) as volume FROM app_fill 
where order_id='wf3' 
and profile_id=0 
and timestamp >= (
    EXTRACT(
        EPOCH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '$time_interval'
    ) * 1000000
  )::bigint

group by rollup(symbol)

SELECT market_id as symbol, sum(-1*fee) as fees
FROM app_fill 
WHERE timestamp >= (
    EXTRACT(
        EPOCH FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '$time_interval'
    ) * 1000000
  )::bigint
group by rollup(market_id)
ORDER BY fees DESC

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), market_id, profile_id, price, size, (price*size) as notional, side, is_maker, fee, liquidation, order_id FROM app_fill 
WHERE timestamp >= $__from::bigint*1000 AND timestamp <= $__to::bigint*1000 AND market_id IN ($symbol) and size > 0.001 
ORDER BY "timestamp" DESC 
LIMIT 100

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), market_id, profile_id, price, size, (price*size) as notional, side, is_maker, fee, liquidation, order_id FROM app_fill 
WHERE timestamp >= $__from::bigint*1000 AND timestamp <= $__to::bigint*1000 AND market_id IN ($symbol) and size > 0.001 and profile_id not in (select profile_id from ignored_profile_ids)
ORDER BY "timestamp" DESC 
LIMIT 100

SELECT to_timestamp(timestamp/1e6), market_id, profile_id, order_type, status, price, size, side, initial_size, total_filled_size, reason FROM app_order 
WHERE timestamp >= $__from::bigint*1000 AND timestamp <= $__to::bigint*1000 AND market_id IN ($symbol)
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 100
